title: Error 183 happens while seleting champ in rank
body: I get this stupid error while playing ranked with a friend during champ select and got leavers I mean my friends are pissed and im pissed please just help me fix this error

replies.body: That 183: Failed to create Dump File error almost always points to some type of break in your network's connection to our servers. You weren't able to choose your champion since your client couldn't actually send any information to us. Let's run a quick check up on some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) making sure to setup port forwarding and flushing your DNS.
